detail_desc: Flip-flops with rubber straps and soles.
Fitted T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.

Blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Wide neckline with covered elastication, wide, 3/4-length raglan sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs, and narrow ties under the bust. Lined in a cotton weave.
Hi-tops with a lightly padded edge and tongue, loop at the back, lacing at the front and a zip in one side. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short jersey T-shirt dress in a soft modal blend with studs at the neckline and sleeve-ends, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts, wide shoulder straps and lacing at the back.
Suede slippers with embroidery and a print motif on the front and elastication around the top. Pile linings and insoles and soft soles.
Short dress in slub cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline, short, frill-trimmed dolman sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Fitted, calf-length dress in a rib knit with a stand-up collar, extra-long sleeves with a slit at the cuffs, and slits in the sides.
Vest top in cotton jersey with an inset mesh V-neck section and print motif.
Playsuit in washed cotton denim with a collar, concealed zip at the front and yoke at the back. Two chest pockets, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a seam and sewn-on tie belt at the waist.
Fitted top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a silk and viscose blend with extra-long sleeves.
Sun visor in fabric and transparent, tinted plastic with a mesh sweatband and elastication at the back.
Jumpsuit in a crinkled viscose weave with a smocked bodice, wide, tie-top shoulder straps, a high waist and straight, wide legs. Unlined.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Top in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs, and a decorative tie detail at the front of the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Suede trainers with elastic gores in the sides. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbed trim around the neckline.
Cardigan in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed, stand-up collar, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, and straight, wide legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides. The trousers are made partly from recycled polyester.

Dress in patterned, lightweight twill with flounces down the front that continue over the back and buttons at the back. Long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbed side panels and a kangaroo pocket. Jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside. Slim Fit.

V-neck dress in an airy weave with buttons at the top, a seam at the waist with a small frill trim and a gathered, softly draping skirt. Long, slightly wider sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Jersey lining.
Romper suit in a cotton weave with flounced shoulder straps, buttons down the front, elastication at the top of the back and elasticated hems.
Sandals in imitation leather. Adjustable strap with a hook and loop fastening around the ankle and a grosgrain loop at the back. Moulded insoles in imitation suede and fluted soles.
Cotton canvas boots with a rubber toe cap and ankle-high shaft. Lacing at the front, a loop at the back and imitation suede details. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in jersey with a gentle V-neck and long sleeves.
Calf-length culottes in a gently draping Tencel™ lyocell weave. High waist with elastication at the back and pleats at the front, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Top in viscose crêpe jersey with a slightly wider neckline, short, flounced sleeves and short slits in the sides.
Rigid hoop earrings in plastic covered in patterned satin and decorated with a fixed bow at the top. Diameter 5.5 cm.
Dress in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a detachable braided imitation suede belt, short raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in stretch, supersoft denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Round-necked, long-sleeved top in stretch, cotton-blend jersey. Slim fit.
Cap in cotton twill with an adjustable metal fastening at the back.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details that are patched inside, an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Straight-cut dress in a viscose weave with a boat neck and short, open sleeves with ties. Unlined.
Metal earrings with a plastic pendant. Length 2.5 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined swimsuit with padded cups, an elasticated top with a frill that extends over the arms, and detachable, adjustable shoulder straps.
Sleeveless dress in soft organic cotton jersey with decorative bows at the shoulders, a gathered seam at the waist and gently flared skirt.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a round neckline and long dolman sleeves.
Shirt in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a frill trim at the front and gathers at the back. Long sleeves and buttoned cuffs with a frill trim.
Shorts in soft cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake jetted back pocket with a button.
Scarf in a soft jacquard weave with fringes on the short sides.

Ankle-length cargo trousers in washed, stretch cotton twill. High waist with elastication at the sides, a zip fly and button, front pockets, a coin pocket and back pockets. Tapered legs with a decorative seam at the front and flap leg pockets with a pleat.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft viscose blend with a ribbed neckline and 3/4-length sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs.

Joggers in cotton poplin with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets, flap leg pockets with concealed press-studs and welt back pockets. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Boys’ briefs in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined front.

Short, A-line dress in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Round neckline and an opening with narrow ties at the back of the neck. Long, voluminous puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Hipster briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend with a wide lace trim at the top. Mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Dress in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with long sleeves, a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
High-waisted, calf-length skirt in an airy viscose weave with a concealed zip. Decorative covered buttons and a high split at one side. Unlined.
Short dress in patterned viscose weave with short sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Hat in soft rib-knit cashmere.
Sports vest top in fast-drying, functional, ribbed fabric made from recycled polyester with a racer back.
Fabric cap with elastication at the back.
Off-the-shoulder dress in airy jersey made from recycled polyester with elastication at the top and short, wide sleeves.
Short-sleeved dress in soft, fine-knit cotton with an appliqué on the front.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Wide shirt in cotton poplin with a pointed collar, buttons down the front and pleat at the back. Long sleeves with pleats for added width and volume, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.

Dance dress in glossy jersey with a motif with reversible sequins at the top, long sleeves and crossover straps at the back. Glittery elasticated seam at the waist and a glittery skirt in two layers of tulle. Lined gusset.

Long-sleeved dress in lace made from a soft cotton blend with a slightly wider neckline and a zip at the back. Seam at the waist with a grosgrain bow and a gently flared skirt. Jersey-lined bodice and skirt.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Short top in a fine, textured knit with a deep V-neck, drawstring down the front and long trumpet sleeves.
Body in lace and mesh with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, cups lined with mesh in a contrasting colour and an elasticated seam under the bust. Lined cups with press-studs.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and contrasting colour trims.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with embroidery, a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs with raw-edge hems.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a double-layered turtle neck and long sleeves.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs with quilted sections on the knees.
Linen jersey top in a relaxed fit with a V-neck, long sleeves and a tie detail at the hem.
Nursing top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a round neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Wrapover front and a practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
High-waisted trousers in woven fabric with a sheen. Zip fly, side pockets and wide legs with creases.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with hard-worn details. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs. Some of the cotton content of the jeans is recycled.
Cotton-blend top in a sturdy, ribbed purl knit in a narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps.
